subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Richie Ramsay of Scotland birdied the first hole of a playoff with a tap-in putt to defeat Shiv Kapur of India and win the South African Open in Paarl.
snippet: Richie Ramsay of Scotland birdied the first hole of a playoff with a tap-in putt to defeat Shiv Kapur of India and win the South African Open in Paarl.
